019package de.mnl.osgi.bnd.repository.maven.idxmvn;
020
021import aQute.bnd.http.HttpClient;
022import aQute.bnd.osgi.Processor;
023import aQute.bnd.osgi.repository.ResourcesRepository;
024import aQute.maven.api.Archive;
025import aQute.maven.provider.MavenBackingRepository;
026import aQute.service.reporter.Reporter;
027import de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.MavenResourceRepository;
028import static de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.RepositoryUtils.rethrow;
029import static de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven.RepositoryUtils.unthrow;
030import java.io.File;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.io.OutputStream;
033import java.net.URL;
034import java.nio.file.Files;
035import java.nio.file.Path;
036import java.util.ArrayList;
037import java.util.Arrays;
038import java.util.Collections;
039import java.util.Comparator;
040import java.util.HashMap;
041import java.util.Iterator;
042import java.util.List;
043import java.util.Map;
044import java.util.Optional;
045import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
046import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
047import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
048import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
049import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
050import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
051import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory;
052import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
053import javax.xml.transform.OutputKeys;
054import javax.xml.transform.Transformer;
055import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
056import javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory;
057import javax.xml.transform.dom.DOMSource;
058import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamResult;
059import org.osgi.resource.Resource;
060import org.osgi.service.repository.Repository;
061import org.slf4j.Logger;
062import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
063import org.w3c.dom.Document;
064import org.w3c.dom.Element;
065
066/**
067 * Provide an OSGi repository (a collection of {@link Resource}s, see 
068 * {@link Repository}), filled with resolved artifacts from given groupIds.
069 */
070@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
071public class IndexedMavenRepository extends ResourcesRepository {
072
073    /* default */ static ExecutorService programLoaders
074        = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(4);
075    /* default */ static ExecutorService revisionLoaders
076        = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(8);
077
078    private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(
079        IndexedMavenRepository.class);
080    private final String name;
081    private final Path indexDbDir;
082    private final Path depsDir;
083    private final List<URL> releaseUrls;
084    private final List<URL> snapshotUrls;
085    private final File localRepo;
086    private final Reporter reporter;
087    private final HttpClient client;
088    private final boolean logIndexing;
089    private final ExecutorService groupLoaders
090        = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(4);
091    private final MavenResourceRepository mavenRepository;
092    private final Map<String, MavenGroupRepository> groups
093        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
094    private Map<String, MavenGroupRepository> backupGroups;
095    private final AtomicBoolean refreshing = new AtomicBoolean();
096
097    /**
098     * Create a new instance that uses the provided information/resources to perform
099     * its work.
100     *
101     * @param name the name
102     * @param releaseUrls the release urls
103     * @param snapshotUrls the snapshot urls
104     * @param localRepo the local Maven repository (cache)
105     * @param indexDbDir the persistent representation of this repository's content
106     * @param reporter a reporter for reporting the progress
107     * @param client an HTTP client for obtaining information from the Nexus server
108     * @param logIndexing the log indexing
109     * @throws Exception the exception
110     */
111    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException",
112        "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
113    public IndexedMavenRepository(String name, List<URL> releaseUrls,
114            List<URL> snapshotUrls, File localRepo, File indexDbDir,
115            Reporter reporter, HttpClient client, boolean logIndexing)
116            throws Exception {
117        this.name = name;
118        this.indexDbDir = indexDbDir.toPath();
119        depsDir = this.indexDbDir.resolve("dependencies");
120        this.releaseUrls = releaseUrls;
121        this.snapshotUrls = snapshotUrls;
122        this.localRepo = localRepo;
123        this.reporter = reporter;
124        this.client = client;
125        this.logIndexing = logIndexing;
126
127        // Check prerequisites
128        if (indexDbDir.exists() && !indexDbDir.isDirectory()) {
129            reporter.error("%s must be a directory.", indexDbDir);
130            throw new IOException(indexDbDir + "must be a directory.");
131        }
132        if (!indexDbDir.exists()) {
133            indexDbDir.mkdirs();
134        }
135        if (!depsDir.toFile().exists()) {
136            depsDir.toFile().mkdir();
137        }
138
139        // Our repository
140        mavenRepository = createMavenRepository();
141
142        // Restore
143        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
144        Map<String, MavenGroupRepository> oldGroups = new HashMap<>();
145        CompletableFuture
146            .allOf(scanRequested(oldGroups), scanDependencies(oldGroups)).get();
147        for (MavenGroupRepository groupRepo : groups.values()) {
148            addAll(groupRepo.getResources());
149        }
150        backupGroups = groups;
151    }
152
153    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException", "resource" })
154    private MavenResourceRepository createMavenRepository() throws Exception {
155        // Create repository from URLs
156        List<MavenBackingRepository> releaseBackers = new ArrayList<>();
157        for (URL url : releaseUrls) {
158            releaseBackers.addAll(MavenBackingRepository.create(
159                url.toString(), reporter, localRepo, client));
160        }
161        List<MavenBackingRepository> snapshotBackers = new ArrayList<>();
162        for (URL url : snapshotUrls) {
163            snapshotBackers.addAll(MavenBackingRepository.create(
164                url.toString(), reporter, localRepo, client));
165        }
166        return new MavenResourceRepository(
167            localRepo, name(), releaseBackers,
168            snapshotBackers, Processor.getExecutor(), reporter)
169                .setResourceSupplier(this::restoreResource);
170    }
171
172    private Optional<Resource> restoreResource(Archive archive) {
173        return Optional.ofNullable(backupGroups.get(archive.revision.group))
174            .flatMap(group -> group.searchInBackup(archive));
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Return the name of this repository.
179     * 
180     * @return the name;
181     */
182    public final String name() {
183        return name;
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Return the representation of this repository in the local file system.
188     * 
189     * @return the location
190     */
191    public final File location() {
192        return indexDbDir.toFile();
193    }
194
195    /**
196     * Returns true if indexing is to be logged.
197     *
198     * @return true, if indexing should be log
199     */
200    public boolean logIndexing() {
201        return logIndexing;
202    }
203
204    /**
205     * Return the Maven repository object used to implements this repository.
206     *
207     * @return the repository 
208     */
209    public MavenResourceRepository mavenRepository() {
210        return mavenRepository;
211    }
212
213    /**
214     * Get or create the group repository for the given group id.
215     * If the repository is created, it is created as a repository
216     * for dependencies.
217     *
218     * @param groupId the group id
219     * @return the repository
220     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
221     */
222    public MavenGroupRepository getOrCreateGroupRepository(String groupId)
223            throws IOException {
224        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.PrematureDeclaration")
225        MavenGroupRepository result = rethrow(IOException.class,
226            () -> groups.computeIfAbsent(groupId,
227                grp -> unthrow(() -> new MavenGroupRepository(grp,
228                    depsDir.resolve(grp), false, this, client, reporter))));
229        return result;
230    }
231
232    /**
233     * Refresh this repository's content.
234     * 
235     * @return true if refreshed, false if not refreshed possibly due to error
236     * @throws Exception if a problem occurs
237     */
238    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
239    public boolean refresh() throws Exception {
240        if (!refreshing.compareAndSet(false, true)) {
241            reporter.warning("Repository is already refreshing.");
242            return false;
243        }
244        String threadName = Thread.currentThread().getName();
245        try {
246            Thread.currentThread().setName("IndexedMaven Refresher");
247            return doRefresh();
248        } finally {
249            Thread.currentThread().setName(threadName);
250            refreshing.set(false);
251        }
252    }
253
254    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops",
255        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals", "PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException" })
256    private boolean doRefresh() throws Exception {
257        mavenRepository.reset();
258        backupGroups = new HashMap<>(groups);
259
260        // Reuse and clear (or create new) group repositories for the existing
261        // directories, first for explicitly requested group ids...
262        groups.clear();
263        scanRequested(backupGroups).get();
264        scanDependencies(backupGroups).get();
265//        CompletableFuture
266//            .allOf(scanRequested(backupGroups), scanDependencies(backupGroups))
267//            .get();
268        // Refresh them all.
269        CompletableFuture<?>[] repoLoaders
270            = new ArrayList<>(groups.values()).stream()
271                .map(repo -> CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
272                    String threadName = Thread.currentThread().getName();
273                    try {
274                        Thread.currentThread()
275                            .setName("RepoLoader " + repo.id());
276                        LOG.debug("Reloading %s...", repo.id());
277                        repo.reload();
278                    } catch (IOException e) {
279                        throw new CompletionException(e);
280                    } finally {
281                        Thread.currentThread().setName(threadName);
282                    }
283                }, groupLoaders))
284                .toArray(CompletableFuture[]::new);
285        CompletableFuture.allOf(repoLoaders).get();
286        // Remove no longer required group repositories.
287        for (Iterator<Map.Entry<String, MavenGroupRepository>> iter
288            = groups.entrySet().iterator(); iter.hasNext();) {
289            Map.Entry<String, MavenGroupRepository> entry = iter.next();
290            if (entry.getValue().removeIfRedundant()) {
291                iter.remove();
292            }
293        }
294        CompletableFuture.allOf(
295            // Persist updated data.
296            CompletableFuture.allOf(new ArrayList<>(groups.values()).stream()
297                .map(repo -> CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
298                    try {
299                        repo.flush();
300                    } catch (IOException e) {
301                        throw new CompletionException(e);
302                    }
303                }, groupLoaders))
304                .toArray(CompletableFuture[]::new)),
305            // Write federated index.
306            CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
307                if (groups.keySet().equals(backupGroups.keySet())) {
308                    return;
309                }
310                try (OutputStream fos
311                    = Files.newOutputStream(indexDbDir.resolve("index.xml"))) {
312                    writeFederatedIndex(fos);
313                } catch (IOException e) {
314                    throw new CompletionException(e);
315                }
316            }, groupLoaders),
317            // Add collected to root (this).
318            CompletableFuture.runAsync(() -> {
319                set(Collections.emptyList());
320                for (MavenGroupRepository groupRepo : groups.values()) {
321                    addAll(groupRepo.getResources());
322                }
323            }, groupLoaders)).get();
324        backupGroups = groups;
325        return true;
326    }
327
328    private CompletableFuture<Void>
329            scanRequested(Map<String, MavenGroupRepository> oldGroups) {
330        return CompletableFuture.allOf(
331            Arrays.stream(indexDbDir.toFile().list()).parallel()
332                .filter(dir -> dir.matches("^[A-Za-z].*")
333                    && !"index.xml".equals(dir)
334                    && !"dependencies".equals(dir))
335                .map(groupId -> CompletableFuture
336                    .runAsync(() -> restoreGroup(oldGroups, groupId, true),
337                        groupLoaders))
338                .toArray(CompletableFuture[]::new));
339    }
340
341    private CompletableFuture<Void>
342            scanDependencies(Map<String, MavenGroupRepository> oldGroups) {
343        if (!depsDir.toFile().canRead() || !depsDir.toFile().isDirectory()) {
344            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(null);
345        }
346        return CompletableFuture.allOf(
347            Arrays.stream(depsDir.toFile().list()).parallel()
348                .filter(dir -> dir.matches("^[A-Za-z].*"))
349                .filter(dir -> {
350                    if (groups.containsKey(dir)) {
351                        // Is/has become explicitly requested
352                        try {
353                            Files.walk(depsDir.resolve(dir))
354                                .sorted(Comparator.reverseOrder())
355                                .map(Path::toFile)
356                                .forEach(File::delete);
357                        } catch (IOException e) {
358                            // TODO Auto-generated catch block
359                            e.printStackTrace();
360                        }
361                        return false;
362                    }
363                    return true;
364                })
365                .map(groupId -> CompletableFuture
366                    .runAsync(() -> restoreGroup(oldGroups, groupId, false),
367                        groupLoaders))
368                .toArray(CompletableFuture[]::new));
369    }
370
371    private void restoreGroup(Map<String, MavenGroupRepository> oldGroups,
372            String groupId, boolean requested) {
373        if (oldGroups.containsKey(groupId)) {
374            // Reuse existing.
375            MavenGroupRepository groupRepo = oldGroups.get(groupId);
376            groupRepo.reset((requested ? indexDbDir : depsDir).resolve(groupId),
377                requested);
378            groups.put(groupId, groupRepo);
379            return;
380        }
381        try {
382            MavenGroupRepository groupRepo
383                = new MavenGroupRepository(groupId,
384                    (requested ? indexDbDir : depsDir).resolve(groupId),
385                    requested, this, client, reporter);
386            groups.put(groupId, groupRepo);
387        } catch (IOException e) {
388            reporter.exception(e,
389                "Cannot create group repository for %s: %s",
390                groupId, e.getMessage());
391        }
392    }
393
394    private void writeFederatedIndex(OutputStream out) {
395        DocumentBuilderFactory dbf = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
396        dbf.setNamespaceAware(true);
397        Document doc;
398        try {
399            doc = dbf.newDocumentBuilder().newDocument();
400        } catch (ParserConfigurationException e) {
401            return;
402        }
403        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidFinalLocalVariable")
404        final String repoNs = "http://www.osgi.org/xmlns/repository/v1.0.0";
405        // <repository name=... increment=...>
406        Element repoNode = doc.createElementNS(repoNs, "repository");
407        repoNode.setAttribute("name", name);
408        repoNode.setAttribute("increment",
409            Long.toString(System.currentTimeMillis()));
410        doc.appendChild(repoNode);
411        for (Map.Entry<String, MavenGroupRepository> repo : groups.entrySet()) {
412            // <referral url=...>
413            Element referral = doc.createElementNS(repoNs, "referral");
414            referral.setAttribute("url",
415                (repo.getValue().isRequested() ? "" : "dependencies/")
416                    + repo.getKey() + "/index.xml");
417            repoNode.appendChild(referral);
418        }
419        // Write federated index.
420        try {
421            Transformer transformer
422                = TransformerFactory.newInstance().newTransformer();
423            transformer.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.INDENT, "yes");
424            DOMSource source = new DOMSource(doc);
425            transformer.transform(source, new StreamResult(out));
426        } catch (TransformerException e) {
427            reporter.exception(e, "Cannot write federated index: %s",
428                e.getMessage());
429        }
430    }
431
432}
